WeaponTraitDef.label: shortened stock
WeaponTraitDef.description: This stock has been cut down to reduce the weapon's overall mass. The result is a lighter, more compact weapon that is easier to carry and maneuver in tight spaces.

WeaponTraitDef.label: telescopic stock
WeaponTraitDef.description: Adjustable retractable stock for improved ergonomics. A better fit allows for a more stable shooting stance and greater precision.

WeaponTraitDef.label: fold stock
WeaponTraitDef.description: Featuring a robust locking mechanism, this folding stock provides an exceptionally stable shoulder rest when deployed. This solid foundation is crucial for maintaining a steady sight picture for accurate shots at medium to long ranges, while its design also slightly reduces the weapon's overall mass.

WeaponTraitDef.label: stabilizer brace
WeaponTraitDef.description: The stabilizing brace that connects to the user's arm, increasing its accuracy.
